name: ANT'A-CATCH
description:
Little Ant Catching Food For Dinner (AVOID THE PEPPERS!)

- - HOW TO PLAY --

- Use your arrow keys (LEFT/RIGHT) or (A/D) to move on the X-axis.

- Dodge the peppers!

-- CREDITS --

- Drawing of the ant and food items (Kevon Johnson)

- Coding/Programming (Kevon Johnson)

- Name Suggestion (Afiya James)

- Drawing of Background (https://twitter.com/cycumber) 

- Music and Sound Effects (https://elements.envato.com/)

-- PURPOSE --

-  Easy and fun to play game when bored.

- You can also compete with friends to see who can get the highest score!

-- DISCLAIMER --

-- This game is an indie game made by a fourteen-year-old. Constructive criticism is accepted. 

-- LASTLY --

Enjoy!!
